abstract.t: This draft describes a profile for compressing RTP/IP using theRobust Header Compression Formal Notation.The RObust Header Compression [1] scheme is designed to compresspacket headers over error prone channels. It is built around anextensible core framework that can be tailored to compress newprotocol stacks by adding additional ROHC profiles.This draft describes a modification of previously published RTPprofiles for ROHC to conform to ROHC-FN [2] and Prolog.
